nodes.text: The Queen's Monument was a bubble structure built by the Gungans of Ohma-D'un. The structure was built to honor Queen Amidala for her efforts in building New Otoh Gunga. The bright purple light at the top of the monument represented the peace between the Gungans and the Naboo. The five rotational lights at the bottom symbolized the Queen's strength, wisdom, beauty, compassion, and leadership.
